__e: And now Jake's in the Army, and I'm all alone.
My husband's in the Army, which means we all are.
You are in the army. You could!
Army didn't put much weight on you.
The army only tells us what they have to.
The Army said you'd been killed in action.
No, five of the biggest Army Rangers I have ever seen and yet you piss your pants at the thought of a sign that's been blowing around the desert for God knows how long.
Son, I am 59 years old. I was mayor of this town since the Carter administration. I'm a retired U. S. Army Ranger and a combat veteran.
Still, it's the duty of every man in the armed forces to do everything he can.
How did I know he was in the army?
I didn't know Tommy was old enough to be in the Army.
